ComicInfo.Summary: While on the way back to the warden of the prison ship Deadpool is currently stuck on, he remembers an adventure he had where he couldn't hear anything or say anything due to the weapon of a masked man named Honey Bee!
ComicInfo.Title: Silent But Deadly Interlude
ComicInfo.Writer: Glenn Alan Herdling,Christopher Priest,Glenn Herdling,Christopher Priest,Glenn Herdling
